website_summaries.verdict: Little Curious George fans will go bananas for this soft and snuggly replica.
pros: Fantastic craftsmanship from a world renowned manufacturer ensures every detail is as it should be
cons: Even at 12”, some adults feel it's just a bit too small

customer_reviews.title: went great with my four year olds “The Man in The ...
customer_reviews.text: So cute, went great with my four year olds “The Man in The Yellow Hat Costume”
customer_reviews.author: Alexander J.

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Soft
customer_reviews.text: We used this for a Halloween costume, but since my toddler also loves Curious George, he now carries it around and sleeps with it. It's a good size for a toddler, soft and exactly as pictured. Only drawback was the shirt has started to pill, so the quality of the shirt isn't great, but overall we are happy with this toy.
customer_reviews.author: Tiff

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for little ones!
customer_reviews.text: This little guys will be perfect for my 1 year old nephew for christmas. It’s just the right size for his little hands. My 12 year old son was obsessed with Curious George when he was 2 years old and wanted to get this for his cousin for that very reason. We are so very pleased with the quality! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Mandikaake

customer_reviews.title: Great stuffed loveable and huggable toy for boys and girls!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one and the pajama wearing one to switch at bedtime to help my one yr old granddaughter go to bed on time....it works! She does not know I have two George's .....yet. We love them! It is soft and sturdy too. I have thrown one in my washing machine with her crib bedding when her sippy cup leaked and it washed nicely,then I left it on my drying rack to air dry all around it.Thank God I had two because her 6 yr old brother came to visit and they started to fight over George so then they each were hugging a different George. My wife is so smart!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle Barnard

customer_reviews.title: Soft, cuddly gift for newborn arrived right on time!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this adorable, soft, cuddly stuffed Curious George as a gift for a friend's baby. It arrived right on time. It is so soft and cuddly! It's a pretty large, high quality stuffed animal, a very good value for the money. I also bought the Curious George Classic Collection set of books via Amazon to give to the same baby, the book set arrived today too, and I can't wait to give these gifts to my friend for their baby! I highly recommend this stuffed Curious George and the seller!
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 1 year old son who is obsessed with Curious George right now. We got it today. It is actually bigger then I thought it would be but is the perfect size and SO soft and cuddly. And in true toddler fashion, my son threw it in the bathtub with his brother. I wrung it out as best as I could and tossed it in the dryer on very low heat. It still looks great, so hopefully it will hold up! Very happy with it so far. (Picture included, put him next to a package of wipes for size reference)
customer_reviews.author: Linebargers

customer_reviews.title: Great When Combined with the Where's Curious George Book!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old loves Curious George books and almost didn't let me our of Nordstrom's when she saw this doll there. Well, waited until we got home and ordered it for Christmas and she loves it! My only doubt is whether I should have gotten the larger one. I couple this with the "Where's Curious George?" book as an intro to Hide & Seek. She finds George in the book, and now I can hide him around the house (in visible sight of course) and she looks around to find the plush. Great fun!
customer_reviews.author: M. JohnsonTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Great monkey for a Man in Yellow Hat Costume
customer_reviews.text: I got the monkey to have with me for Halloween to wear to school. I'm a teacher so I went as Man in yellow Hat. It was perfect for that reason and added just the right touch. He's pretty inexpensive which is great, but lacks some of Curious George's charm... perhaps you can't find it in a children's toy.... but I figure there's probably a more charming little monkey elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Kari Milton

customer_reviews.title: They're best buds. His nose is oddly large for his ...
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter had a bedtime bear with a hard round nose that she was biting at night and we were worried it would fall off eventually. She started really liking George from the books, so we got her this with a big round nose and nothing plastic on it - she LOVES it. She can't wait to get into bed at night, she talks to George for 20 minutes before she falls asleep. They're best buds. His nose is oddly large for his body, but all the more for biting!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth M.

customer_reviews.title: Check for failed stitching before giving to a child. Then, enjoy this awesome plushie!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome stuffy for the kid. At present it's bigger than her, so I know we'll get lots of life out of it. Just one thing... There was a blown stitch on his back that required needle and thread before letting the child have it. A small hole about an inch long. Not too bad. I expect to have to perform "surgery" on him occasionally over the years, but right out the box was a little annoying. Just check thoroughly before you give this thing to a child...
customer_reviews.author: Kevin R.

customer_reviews.title: Cute design for George lovers
customer_reviews.text: Good value for price paid. So cute. Toddler loves George so this is perfect. It’s as described as far as size- if anything it’s slightly bigger in person than I imagined so it’s perfect for a toddler. Eyes are plastic pieces, but seem secure. Quality design and official licensing and name brand Gund plush toy. It’s way easier to hunt down specific character items like this on amazon than hunt stores for them bc finding items is always hit or miss w certain characters.
customer_reviews.author: GA Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it. Average quality. What you see is what you get.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. I would say it is average in quality and neither raises above nor falls below your typical stuffed animal. I gave it 4/5 stars for durability because toys are just not made like they used to be. I would buy it again and would recommend it to others if they are considering it.
customer_reviews.author: LMI

customer_reviews.title: Love George but...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great gift for any young child who enjoys stuffed animals! My only negative remark is that there are three tags that are visible on the "rear" of George. It was not easy to remove them without damaging the stuffed animal. My suggestion to the manufacturer would be to locate the tags on the back underneath Georges shirt which would make it unnecessary to remove them. Unfortunately the manufacturer does not show these tags in their pictures or video.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy T

customer_reviews.title: My son is scared of him! 😓
customer_reviews.text: I bought George for my two year old who loves the cartoon. Sadly he’s afraid of him and throws him if you attempt to put him anywhere nearby. My four year old has adopted him so at least he has a happy ending. I myself think he’s pretty cute and have no idea why my toddler is scared. Hopefully he’ll grow out of it and reclaim him.
customer_reviews.author: Maria M.

customer_reviews.title: Back again!
customer_reviews.text: Well needless to say- I need to purchase another George as my 6 and 4 year old are currently fighting over him! No good deed goes unpunished! This stuffie is well made- very soft and cuddly- too cuddly and no big enough to share apparently! A great companion for any curious George fan!
customer_reviews.author: LnASmom

customer_reviews.title: A great little buddy for George fans
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Curious George stuffed animal for my son who had recently been interested in the cartoon. He loves him and he sleeps in his bed with him every night. The only issue I’ve noticed after months of play is that George’s t-shirt is pilling slightly, but that’s to be expect since it’s a jersey material. Overall, we love George and he’s made a great friend for my son!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: It has a nice face and is soft and cuddly. I am looking forward to giving it to my little grandson. The 12" is just the right size for the smaller infant/toddler. The arms and legs seems like they will be easy to hold onto and overall it seems well made.
customer_reviews.author: Creaky

customer_reviews.title: 10.5 inches at best..
customer_reviews.text: I am a little disappointed that George is not as big as described. He is only 10.5 inches at best. I can say he is cute, soft and cuddly. I think my 2 year old daughter will be happy to have him regardless of his size. Our George is from Gund (I know some reviewers say they received one that was not). All in all despite the size I am pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: T. Saldana

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and Plush
customer_reviews.text: Adorable and plush, great quality .. on the smaller side but perfect for a baby gift or a toddler .. I would go with a size up if getting for 3+ ages
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer H

customer_reviews.title: Not sure why but my 18-month old like George the moment she saw it
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why but my 18-month old like George the moment she saw it. A lot of giggling, hugging, feeding and padding, and then they slept together in the crib the same night. Looks like I have to get another one for my second baby because I can't count on them to share it. Update: one year later, my daughter can't go to preschool without George. I have to wash it every week and now try to buy another one as backup.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Mower

customer_reviews.title: If it doesn't have a tail, it's not a monkey!
customer_reviews.text: Where is the tail GUND? This thing has no tail. All monkeys have tails. Or if you take the logical inverse, if it doesn't have a tail, it's not a monkey. For any questions, please listen to the Monkey Song by Veggie Tales.
customer_reviews.author: Fireduck

customer_reviews.title: ... year old niece in May and it is her favorite " stuffy"
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 2 year old niece in May and it is her favorite " stuffy" , she never leaves home without it . Good size . Easy for small hands to hold onto . Super soft and washable , always a plus. Perfect for anyone that loves George!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not 12ins
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuffed animal. My little one loves it too. The one I received was made by GUND. The only problem I hand and the reason I only gave it 4 stars is that it is not 12 ins long. It is around 11. I know that isn’t to big of a deal but I like things to be advertised truthfully.
customer_reviews.author: BrittMae

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this little George!! My 10 month old couldn't stop smiling when I gave it to him! He loves watching Curious George! And the 12 inch size is perfect for my son. He's really soft and comes with a cute little t-shirt. His eye buttons seem very well attached too so I'm not worried about them becoming a hazard for my son. It's perfect! Thank you! :)
customer_reviews.author: Jen Ambrosio

customer_reviews.title: Good Little Monkey
customer_reviews.text: A good quality stuffed animal, very soft and seems durable. Only four stars, though, because it doesn't LOOK all that much like Curious George the character. I know, I know, there's a picture right there-- but I'd hoped that it might be a little more recognizable in person. I gave this to my son for his third birthday a few weeks ago, and despite the fact that he's very familiar with the character (he loves the show, and we have a bunch of the books), he didn't recognize this toy as being "George the Monkey." The lettering on the shirt doesn't help someone who's too young to read it, unfortunately. But still, it's a nice stuffed monkey.
customer_reviews.author: Arreyn Grey

customer_reviews.title: He's adorable and the perfect size for cuddling all day and ...
customer_reviews.text: George keeps hiding in our house and when he reappears, my boy hides him again to keep him from the dog. He loves George. George spent all day this Saturday in our boat while our toddler helped Daddy fix the engine, and now, George is driving the boat. He's adorable and the perfect size for cuddling all day and seems to be quite content being squeezed, chased, and pulled.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Wadsworth

customer_reviews.title: Just like the cartoon
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 2 year old son. He absolutely loves it. Good quality. Size is perfect. The smaller version would have been too small. Glad I got the 12" George. This will be a toy that gets saved in the memory box. Excellent stuffed animal.
customer_reviews.author: Louie

customer_reviews.title: Very cute, Perfect size for my two year old
customer_reviews.text: My two-year-old is obsessed with Curious George. We purchased this as decor and a keepsake for his birthday. It's the perfect size for a little person to tote around and super cute. I would recommend for Curious George lovers!
customer_reviews.author: KMMB

customer_reviews.title: It's Curious George. What's not to love?
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my son as a joke gift, now that he's 14 and thinks he's a cool dude. He used to LOVE George when he was a little kid. We had a good laugh. George stays on his bed now. LOL. Curious George rocks!
customer_reviews.author: F-Rod

customer_reviews.title: WE ARE VERY HAPPY WITH GEORGE
customer_reviews.text: MY GRANDDAUGHTER ( 16 MTHS OLD ) WATCHES CURIOUS GEORGE ALL THE TIME SO CAN YOU IMAGINE THE LOOK ON HER FACE WHEN WE PRESENTED THIS TO HER. SHE HASN'T LET HIM GO YET, IT'S HER NEW SIDE KICK. WE ARE VERY HAPPY WITH GEORGE. WELL MADE, CUDDLY AND SOFT. THANK YOU
customer_reviews.author: Myriam Morales

customer_reviews.title: Gotta get a Gund Curious George!
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this cute adorable little fella. He is so soft and cuddly and worth the price. He looks exactly like the character played on television and in the books and his smile will brighten your child's day!
customer_reviews.author: tmd

customer_reviews.title: Seriously Cute
customer_reviews.text: Curious George is such a huge hit in this house, due to us having a toddler. He watches the show everyday. Imagine his face when he saw he has a George he can hug anytime he wants. He loves it. It goes with him everywhere. It's his lovey at night!
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Marandino

customer_reviews.title: Great doll but not overly rugged
customer_reviews.text: It is 16 inches tall and it looks a lot like Curious George. The stitching in a few places isn't as pretty as I had hoped for. The overall feel isn't as solid as I had wanted. It looks great but it holding up to lifetime of use, I'm not very confident it would last
customer_reviews.author: mark pipetTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Curious George Is Timeless!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness! This toy is so cute and a perfect size for a toddler. Very cuddly, too! It was paired with a Curious George board book for a two year old birthday gift and very well received indeed!
customer_reviews.author: CKA

customer_reviews.title: Gotta Getta Gund
customer_reviews.text: George was given as a baby shower gift. Though I didn't actually measure him before I gave him he seemed small and I'd venture he wasn't actually 12 inches, closer to 10 I'd bet. He was cute and well made. I would recommend him to others.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Soft, Plush, Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: This Curious George is so soft and snuggable. It is the perfect size for my little one to carry around and the surface washes farely well. It's legs dangle freely but is also weighted in the backside so it sits up on its own as well.
customer_reviews.author: SereneChaos

customer_reviews.title: Veru cute, good quality stuffed animal
customer_reviews.text: My daughter love Curious George so getting her a stuffed one was a must. This is a great stuffed animal. It is good quality and my e year old daughter loves it. I was hesitant to buy the smaller size but it works great for her. The stitching and colors are good. Looks like Curious George! It is a durable stuffed animal. Exactly what we expected.
customer_reviews.author: Michael and Amy Hilliard

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect size, softness, and built quality Im surprised it does not talk ;) My kids love it If they like curious george , do not hesitate , this will be their fav plush toy for a while
customer_reviews.author: AYMEN3M

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware. This is literally a tiny tight version of curious George it is not worth the money do not pay this by the standard doll. Unfortunately you will end up paying an arm and a leg to ship the item back just to get your refund which in the end you end up not getting a refund because you pay too much in shipping. Also it states that it was handed directly to a resident which it was most definitely not it was thrown on the porch.
customer_reviews.author: Christa Riley

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for this quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Gund makes probably the best plush toys. I'm not surprised that this plush surpassed my expectations. 1. Plush was soft. 2. Great deal for the price. 3. Shirt is too cute on George.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon LOVER!

customer_reviews.title: I bought this as a gift for my great nephew who is 9 years old
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my great nephew who is 9 years old. He just loves and collects anyrhing thal is a a monkey toy or stuffed animal. He was just so surprised and excited to receive this perfect size curious George. It was perfect. I received it fast and the price was excellent for the sjze
customer_reviews.author: TRM

customer_reviews.title: This one is great. My two-and-a-half-year-old granddaughter is enchanted with her "George"
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to get "real" toys for kids, anymore, that are well made and true to the original products. This one is great. My two-and-a-half-year-old granddaughter is enchanted with her "George". She loves monkeys!
customer_reviews.author: AStricklin

customer_reviews.title: Curious George Rocks!
customer_reviews.text: My three year old daughter LOVES Curious George! Every time we volunteer in the library she has to find George on the shelf and give him lots of love. She was always sad leaving him behind though so I got her one of her own. It's not as big as the one in the library but it's super soft and perfect for toddler arms.
customer_reviews.author: FaerieTxn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for a toddler
customer_reviews.text: A three-year old toddler in my extended family has a passion for Curious George (as did his mother when she was little) and this plush doll was the perfect gift for him. It's large, very soft and is a constant companion when he's out playing (he reminds me of Calvin & Hobbes the way he plays with it). It's a full 16-inches tall and very well made. It has no little parts that can come off and pose a hazard to a small child. I noticed that the head is a little bit large in proportion to the rest of George's body, but the doll is so much fun for him that it doesn't matter.
customer_reviews.author: EusebiusTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Cute as can be!
customer_reviews.text: Being a Curious George fan, I had to buy this for my new grandson, in hopes that he would love him as well! George is well-made and a good cuddling size for toddler or pre-schooler. I expect this little guy to last a long time with the normal amount of hugging, squeezing, and dragging around. A purchase I'm glad I made. Recommended for your George fan!
customer_reviews.author: Red Teapot

customer_reviews.title: Sweet George!
customer_reviews.text: This plush Curious George is a lot cuter and cuddlier than the picture looks! Personally, I thought that the hands and feet in the posted picture looked a bit creepy, and was not sure how they were going to look when seen close-up, but they are very sweet and the doll itself is just adorable. My 4 year old niece really loved it, and I'm really happy that I didn't hesitate and bought the "Only One Left!" a few days before Christmas. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: AndreaF

customer_reviews.title: Great little monkey
customer_reviews.text: This monkey makes for a great gift. My daughter gave this to a friend who loves Curious George and she fell in love instantly. It is soft and plush. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: unknown

customer_reviews.title: Best Curious George on the market
customer_reviews.text: This guy is perfect is every way. Just how I remember him growing up. Very cuddly my son took to him right away and makes “ooh ooh” monkey noises. Must buy for any fan.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lynch

customer_reviews.title: We really love this curious George he is a perfect size for ...
customer_reviews.text: We really love this curious George he is a perfect size for my grandson who is a toddler and also loves it very much! The only issue I have and the only reason I gave it three stars is I am having a difficult time finding a replacement Eye that fell out. If not for that it would’ve definitely received five stars.!!!
customer_reviews.author: BRENDA RIOS-BOLADO

customer_reviews.title: My Daughter Loves George!
customer_reviews.text: My 15-month old daughter absolutely LOVES Curious George! My husband and I wanted to get her a stuffed animal of George to play with since we don't let her watch a lot of tv. After ordering a different Curious George stuffed animal, and being greatly disappointed, I came across Gund's 12" Plush Curious George and decided to give this one a try since Gund is known for quality products. From the moment we opened the box, we knew we had the perfect Curious George for our little girl! Right away we noticed how sturdy the workmanship was and the size was perfect! Our little girl is very happy with her new friend, and we have no complaints! Well done, Gund!
customer_reviews.author: Musician's Friend

customer_reviews.title: Sweet George
customer_reviews.text: Oh, what's not to love about Curious George? So cute, soft and friendly. Pair this with a related book for a baby gift. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: VA

customer_reviews.title: Great stuffie
customer_reviews.text: Great stuffie. Soft and squeezable. Cute, bright colors, and pleasant expression. Perfect for toddler who loves Curious George.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: A new best friend
customer_reviews.text: George quickly became my 2 year olds best friend. He carries George every where. George is a regular nap and night time companion.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Bullock-mccollough

customer_reviews.title: She loves him!
customer_reviews.text: When unwrapping, the three year old gift receiver took him out, dropped the box, and gave him a big ol’ hug! She loves George! He is super soft and cuddly. I checked. :)
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: My kids love him
customer_reviews.text: He's so simple but so cute. Both my boys adore him and both have one to sleep with nightly. His shirt did pill within 2 wks so that's a downfall but overall, he's a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: Krys

customer_reviews.title: Curious but cuddly
customer_reviews.text: Who doesn't like Curious George something very nice for my great nephew Zane Jeremiah to hug and cuddle while he sleeps
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Kraft

customer_reviews.title: Gund 12" Elmo and George were hits!
customer_reviews.text: George had gotten A LOT of love in my house. He is a great size and my 2 year old takes him and her Gund Sesame Street 12" Elmo everywhere. They are both favorites. She has A LOT of stuffed animals, but those are the only two she ever asks for by name. The quality on both is outstanding. They are super cute, the sowing is done well and they are easy for little hands to hold and cuddle.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Webb

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sized Curious George toy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this Curious George toy for my daughter because she couldn't part with the Curious George doll her kindergarten class allows the children take home for a week. I chose the smaller size and it is a perfect size for her to carry everywhere and snuggle at night. She has not put it down since it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Hibbard

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Cozy Monkey
customer_reviews.text: Liked the softness of the monkey, but the shirt got rough quickly. My children love Curious Jorge. So, they sleep with their monkey and like to carry him around with them. Perfect size to carry him around, but would like the shirt to be more durable so that it looks better.
customer_reviews.author: N. Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Soft, cuddly, just the right size
customer_reviews.text: Its not easy to find Curious George items these days and this stuffed animal is soft and just the right size for my child to snuggle through the night.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected, but not bad!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I thought it was going to be stiff like those stuffed animals you win at fairs but, fortunately, it's very soft and plushy! I was hoping he'd be sort of a proportional little buddy for my 2-year-old but his head is huge so he's more like a big toy, which is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for our granddaughter to carry around. It has a very sweet face just like the cartoon character. I have seen other curious George stuffed toys that are not nearly as soft or cute. This one is adorable!
customer_reviews.author: Xanthia

customer_reviews.title: Nephew loved it
customer_reviews.text: My nephew loves Curious George, and I got this for him for his 3rd bday. His face lit up when he saw it, and it was one of his fave gifts. Yep, I'm a cool auntie. Lol
customer_reviews.author: C.L. Green

customer_reviews.title: Monkey
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product a few years ago and I still have it. Bought for a toddler's toy and it still looks new! Great quality
customer_reviews.author: michelle ritter

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: George is adorable! You can’t go wrong with this George . He looks just like curious George the kids will love him
customer_reviews.author: Jen p

customer_reviews.title: Very Tough
customer_reviews.text: So far George has been pretty tough. My daughter takes him everywhere and he's still in one piece. good solid product. would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Daniel

customer_reviews.title: one year old's favorite toy
customer_reviews.text: Gave two to my two nephews' sons, born a month apart. Both got a ton of toys at their combined one year old party. One liked it ok - the other, after a year, won't go to bed without it. His mom reads him the books, he snuggles the toy. Gave my own son a George 25 years ago - he still has it. These are a little bigger. Wasn't sure they'd be as good for a small boy, but seem to be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: One George is great! The other not so much.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. I bought him for my preschoolers to take home and do a journal page for his activities. He's the perfect size for a three or four year old. Very soft and cuddly. He's holding up well so far and he gets washed every so often too. An update: I ordered two of these for my two preschool classes. One has held up well. One has not. I’ve had to hand sew seams on legs and head. Took away a star.
customer_reviews.author: P. Curry

customer_reviews.title: Must-Have for Your Curious Little Georges
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this two months ago as a birthday gift for a sweet 2-year-old boy I nanny for who is obsessed with Curious George. It was the perfect gift!! I am so glad I found this for my little guy, he absolutely loves his George and is constantly hugging him, carrying him, feeding him, and sleeping with him. The 16 inch George is the perfect size for kiddos and the quality is unexpectedly amazing, very soft and durable. I would be more stuffed animals like this and absolutely recommend this for any little Curious George fans out there! Your kids will be in love.
customer_reviews.author: Kylie B.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable gift and a must if you like Curious George
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these for prizes at a Curious George storytime celebration. So cute! They are the perfect snuggly size for kids and the kids loved them. They were also a cute part of the decor.
customer_reviews.author: Kara A

customer_reviews.title: I paid $5 for it which I thought was an awesome deal! The only part of this toy that ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Curious George for my one year old son. He really likes my daughter's Curious George that is nearly identical to this one so I wanted him to have his own. I picked hers up a few years ago. It was one of the "Kohls Cares" toys. I paid $5 for it which I thought was an awesome deal! The only part of this toy that disappointed me was the eyes. They're plastic instead of embroidered like our other one. Otherwise the quality is great!
customer_reviews.author: BCascioli

customer_reviews.title: very well made monkey
customer_reviews.text: very nice stuffed animal. my 1 year old plays with it. the eyes are buttons though so we watch her with it so she doesn't swallow them.
customer_reviews.author: 4DSCdude

customer_reviews.title: Cute and durable
customer_reviews.text: Nephew loved this. He still has it so well made for a young child to still have in tact for two years
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Foe

customer_reviews.title: Cute and perfect size for my boy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a present for my 3-year-old son as he loves reading Curious George books. My son loves it! This stuffed toy is soft and perfect for cuddling. He brings it everywhere -- even when we go grocery shopping :)
customer_reviews.author: Mdazmi

customer_reviews.title: Very NIce
customer_reviews.text: Gund does it again. As a teacher, I use it when I read the book. The children love it. I have 13 now and they are all great. I will order again if I get more students.
customer_reviews.author: Mayhem

customer_reviews.title: Snuggle perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love this curious George! It's the perfect size for our 2 year old. She pretends he's a baby and he fits in her doll stroller. She can tot him around. It's extremely soft as well so she also sleeps with him. Now we haven't had to wash him yet so not sure how that will turn out but I think ok!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Masterfield

customer_reviews.title: Cute and easy for a toddler to handle
customer_reviews.text: George is getting a lot of action from Toddler Granddaughter ( almost 2) . He has been in the washer and dryer a couple of times and is holding his own. He's true to the picture . Cute and easy for a toddler to handle
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. Son absolutely loves his George.
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES this stuffed animal. He loves him so much, I've bought three because he lost the first one and I wanted to have a back up.
customer_reviews.author: atlmichelle

customer_reviews.title: Backup George - Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a "backup George" for my 1 year old son. He got one for his first birthday, and it is THE toy he is attached to. Having learned my lesson with our first child, I didn't want to risk losing his favorite/comfort toy, so I wanted a backup. The original came from Macy's, and was around $35. This is the same one, and I think I paid around $16 on Amazon. It's really well made, and it takes a lot of abuse. I switch it out with the other one 1-2 times per month so they wear evenly.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Slade

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter Loves George
customer_reviews.text: This is a great size for my 2 year old granddaughter. She gets him out every time watches Curious George.
customer_reviews.author: D Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: So soft and cute!
customer_reviews.text: My son is a big fan of curious George - and he has a larger one he sleeps with at home. We got this for his transition to preschool. It’s the perfect size and so soft!
customer_reviews.author: Dsmama

customer_reviews.title: Friend
customer_reviews.text: This monkey can be friend for whole life as i write review , you see him here with me. It is with my kid from like years
customer_reviews.author: wellwisher

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very soft stuffed animal! My grandson loves Curious George and enjoys having his own “George”
customer_reviews.author: marianne turner

customer_reviews.title: Love this.
customer_reviews.text: My kids really love this product, it has worked great for us I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Blp

customer_reviews.title: Giant George = Giant Smiles from my daughter
customer_reviews.text: I hated to pay so much for this giant plush, but my daughter's face when she saw him on Christmas morning was worth it. Stiching is well done and he is just what she wanted. She has been dragging him around the house for days now and he still looks great. Very pleased with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Mia C Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Awesome plush.
customer_reviews.text: My son is 9 months old and loves the Curious Gerorge show, I bought this for him due to that fact. He loves it! I bought the 12in one and it’s a perfect size for us. We can easily stuff it in the diaper bag on the go. He sleeps with it also and holds it. It’s cute. Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Really cute
customer_reviews.text: This is even cuter in person! It's soft and a really nice size for a toddler!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Buddy
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old is currently going through a Curious George phase so I bought this stuffed animal for him in 12 inches. He loves it! He takes George with him everywhere and goes to sleep with him. It's a perfect size for him to hold and carry around.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole J.

customer_reviews.title: gift for my 2 year old
customer_reviews.text: my almost 2 year old loves george!!!!!! so i had to get this for her 2nd birthday. i just got him in the mail today and he is super cute, big enough for her to drage around. soft, and cuddly. she hasnt got him yet to play with, but i know shes going to love him. he seems like he will be a great toy to sleep and play with. i say if your child loves george like mine does then this is the doll to get them. it would be great for a boy or girl. i already wrapped him so i dont know if the shirt comes off.
customer_reviews.author: teeni300

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift after watching Curious George's Christmas Special
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old has been watching Curious George's Christmas Special on Netflix. Arrived quickly and appears to be high quality. I think he'll love it.
customer_reviews.author: R. Shackleford

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my almost 3 yr old daughter and she LOVES it!!! Had not put it down since I gave it to her! Adorable!!
customer_reviews.author: Prilly

customer_reviews.title: Soft, well made, and hey...it's Curious George :)
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for my little girl who loves Curious George! Soft, appears well made, great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Wohali

customer_reviews.title: Cute little guy
customer_reviews.text: My son was the Man in the Yellow Hat for Halloween so this little "Georgie" was his pal!!! Okay, so it didn't work out perfectly because my little two-year-old was NOT being a "good little monkey" and wouldn't carry him. (I'm hearing George's "uh oooooh") But he is SOOOO cute and great quality!!
customer_reviews.author: Mik Rhab

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for pric
customer_reviews.text: Came quickly and was just what I wanted, small but not too small.
customer_reviews.author: Iteach4

customer_reviews.title: His favorite character is Curious George
customer_reviews.text: I received this for my son's birthday. His favorite character is Curious George, so we were very disappointed to receive him with stains all over him and the stuffing coming out. Wasn't very expensive so it's not worth shipping back. Ended up throwing it away /: Not very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitie James

customer_reviews.title: curious george is always a hit
customer_reviews.text: no matter what, this cuddly buddy is always a hit with both girls and boys.
customer_reviews.author: pc

customer_reviews.title: Description NOT accurate
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea why this is advertised as a 12-inch Curious George; it is no more than 9 inches and the only Dimension that would come close to 12 inches is if you spread its arms and you measure its wingspan from the farthest tip of each opposing fingers on its hands.
customer_reviews.author: Jose P.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size. Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size. Great quality. I researched several stuffed Georges before buying and I'm so glad I spent a few dollars more for a bigger and better quality stuffed animal! Bought this to go with our 2 year olds "man in the yellow hat" costume and it was perfect. Shipping was fast as it arrived exactly when we needed it for our costume party.
customer_reviews.author: TruLu

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for kindergarten glass, perfect for kids!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah H.

customer_reviews.title: Curious George monkey
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with the softness and quality! So cute!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: GUND Curious George Stuffed Animal Plush, 12"
product_meta.description:
Size:12"GUND has teamed up with everybody’s favorite monkey — Curious George! This adorable 12” plush version of Curious George features a red t-shirt with his signature written in yellow. Accurate details make this plush the perfect gift for that special George fan in your life! As always, high-quality and huggably soft plush ensures that GUND products remain loyal pals for years to come. Surface-washable. Ages one and up. About GUND: For more than 100 years, GUND has been a premier plush company recognized worldwide for quality innovative products. Building upon our award-winning and beloved plush designs, we continue to practice innovation by constantly developing new original and licensed designs to appeal to the next generation of customers. To that end, each one of our plush toys is constructed from premium materials for unparalleled softness and huggability.

BRAND STORY
By Gund

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Dressed in his classic red shirt, this Curious George is 12" tall… and extra soft and huggable. Surface washable.

See more
feature_bullets: Plush Curious George with red t-shirt and yellow signature
Soft, huggable material built to famous GUND quality standards
